00030 struct rdp_inst
00031 {
00032         int version;
00033         int size;
00034         rdpSet * settings;
00035         void * rdp;
00036         void * param1;
00037         void * param2;
00038         void * param3;
00039         void * param4;
00040         /* calls from ui to library */
00041         int (* rdp_connect)(struct rdp_inst * inst);
00042         int (* rdp_get_fds)(struct rdp_inst * inst, void ** read_fds, int * read_count,
00043                 void ** write_fds, int * write_count);
00044         int (* rdp_check_fds)(struct rdp_inst * inst);
00045         int (* rdp_send_input)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int message_type, int device_flags,
00046                 int param1, int param2);
00047         /* calls from library to ui */
00048         void (* ui_error)(struct rdp_inst * inst, char * text);
00049         void (* ui_warning)(struct rdp_inst * inst, char * text);
00050         void (* ui_unimpl)(struct rdp_inst * inst, char * text);
00051         void (* ui_begin_update)(struct rdp_inst * inst);
00052         void (* ui_end_update)(struct rdp_inst * inst);
00053         void (* ui_desktop_save)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int offset, int x, int y,
00054                 int cx, int cy);
00055         void (* ui_desktop_restore)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int offset, int x, int y,
00056                 int cx, int cy);
00057         RD_HBITMAP (* ui_create_bitmap)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int width, int height, uint8 * data);
00058         void (* ui_paint_bitmap)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int x, int y, int cx, int cy, int width,
00059                 int height, uint8 * data);
00060         void (* ui_destroy_bitmap)(struct rdp_inst * inst, RD_HBITMAP bmp);
00061         void (* ui_line)(struct rdp_inst * inst, uint8 opcode, int startx, int starty, int endx,
00062                 int endy, RD_PEN * pen);
00063         void (* ui_rect)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int x, int y, int cx, int cy, int colour);
00064         void (* ui_polygon)(struct rdp_inst * inst, uint8 opcode, uint8 fillmode, RD_POINT * point,
00065                 int npoints, RD_BRUSH * brush, int bgcolour, int fgcolour);
00066         void (* ui_polyline)(struct rdp_inst * inst, uint8 opcode, RD_POINT * points, int npoints,
00067                 RD_PEN * pen);
00068         void (* ui_ellipse)(struct rdp_inst * inst, uint8 opcode, uint8 fillmode, int x, int y,
00069                 int cx, int cy, RD_BRUSH * brush, int bgcolour, int fgcolour);
00070         void (* ui_start_draw_glyphs)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int bgcolour, int fgcolour);
00071         void (* ui_draw_glyph)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int x, int y, int cx, int cy,
00072                 RD_HGLYPH glyph);
00073         void (* ui_end_draw_glyphs)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int x, int y, int cx, int cy);
00074         uint32 (* ui_get_toggle_keys_state)(struct rdp_inst * inst);
00075         void (* ui_bell)(struct rdp_inst * inst);
00076         void (* ui_destblt)(struct rdp_inst * inst, uint8 opcode, int x, int y, int cx, int cy);
00077         void (* ui_patblt)(struct rdp_inst * inst, uint8 opcode, int x, int y, int cx, int cy,
00078                 RD_BRUSH * brush, int bgcolour, int fgcolour);

00080                 int srcx, int srcy);
00081         void (* ui_memblt)(struct rdp_inst * inst, uint8 opcode, int x, int y, int cx, int cy,
00082                 RD_HBITMAP src, int srcx, int srcy);

00084                 RD_HBITMAP src, int srcx, int srcy, RD_BRUSH * brush, int bgcolour, int fgcolour);
00085         RD_HGLYPH (* ui_create_glyph)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int width, int height, uint8 * data);
00086         void (* ui_destroy_glyph)(struct rdp_inst * inst, RD_HGLYPH glyph);
00087         int (* ui_select)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int rdp_socket);
00088         void (* ui_set_clip)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int x, int y, int cx, int cy);
00089         void (* ui_reset_clip)(struct rdp_inst * inst);
00090         void (* ui_resize_window)(struct rdp_inst * inst);
00091         void (* ui_set_cursor)(struct rdp_inst * inst, RD_HCURSOR cursor);
00092         void (* ui_destroy_cursor)(struct rdp_inst * inst, RD_HCURSOR cursor);
00093         RD_HCURSOR (* ui_create_cursor)(struct rdp_inst * inst, unsigned int x, unsigned int y,
00094                 int width, int height, uint8 * andmask, uint8 * xormask, int bpp);
00095         void (* ui_set_null_cursor)(struct rdp_inst * inst);
00096         void (* ui_set_default_cursor)(struct rdp_inst * inst);
00097         RD_HCOLOURMAP (* ui_create_colourmap)(struct rdp_inst * inst, RD_COLOURMAP * colours);
00098         void (* ui_move_pointer)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int x, int y);
00099         void (* ui_set_colourmap)(struct rdp_inst * inst, RD_HCOLOURMAP map);
00100         RD_HBITMAP (* ui_create_surface)(struct rdp_inst * inst, int width, int height, RD_HBITMAP old);
00101         void (* ui_set_surface)(struct rdp_inst * inst, RD_HBITMAP surface);
00102         void (* ui_destroy_surface)(struct rdp_inst * inst, RD_HBITMAP surface);
00103 };
00104 typedef struct rdp_inst rdpInst;
